mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.inquirydetailnum AS "inquirydetailnum", a.ordernum AS "ordernum", a.validdate AS "validdate", a.supplier AS "supplier", a.materialname AS "materialname", a.size AS "size", a.unit AS "unit", a.unitprice AS "unitprice", a.requisition AS "requisition", a.maker AS "maker", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "update", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.brand AS "brand", a.suppliercode AS "suppliercode", a.inquiry_time AS "inquiryTime", a.materialcode AS "materialcode", a.state AS "state"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_inquiry_detail( id, inquirydetailnum, ordernum, validdate, supplier, materialname, size, unit, unitprice, requisition, maker, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, brand, suppliercode, inquiry_time, materialcode ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{inquirydetailnum}, #{ordernum}, #{validdate}, #{supplier}, #{materialname}, #{size}, #{unit}, #{unitprice}, #{requisition}, #{maker}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{update}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{brand}, #{suppliercode}, #{inquiryTime}, #{materialcode} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM account_inquiry_detail a
WHERE a.ordernum = #{ordernum} AND a.state=1

SELECT b.materialNum as materialcode, b.materialName as materialname,b.size as size FROM account_inquiry_detail a LEFT JOIN account_material b ON a.materialCode=b.materialNum WHERE a.inquirydetailnum=#{inquirydetailnum} AND a.supplierCode=#{suppliercode} group by materialname

SELECT a.inquirydetailnum as inquirydetailnum,b.orderNum as ordernum, c.supplier as supplier,c.supplierNum as suppliercode FROM account_inquiry_detail a LEFT JOIN account_inquiry b ON a.inquirydetailnum=b.id LEFT JOIN account_supplier c ON a.suppliercode=c.supplierNum LEFT JOIN account_material d ON a.materialcode=d.materialNum WHERE b.title = #{purchasenumtitle} group by c.supplier

SELECT a.materialname AS "materialname", a.materialcode AS "materialcode" FROM account_inquiry_detail a
WHERE a.ordernum = #{ordernum} GROUP BY a.materialcode
